summary.para: A MonoBehaviour test needs to implement this interface.
Indicates when the test is considered finished.
Interface for the method that implements the postbuild step.
Cleanup method that is automatically called after all the test have run.
Interface for the method that implements the prebuild step.
Setup method that is automatically called before the test run.
LogAssert allows you to expect Unity log messages that would normally cause the test to fail.
Set this property to true to prevent unexpected error log messages from triggering an assertion. This property is set to false by default.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.LogAssert.Expect(UnityEngine.LogType,System.String)

summary.para: Expect a log message of a specfic type. If an error, assertion or exception log is expected, the test will not fail. The test will fail if a log message is expected but does not appear.

member.param: Log type.
Log message to expect.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.LogAssert.Expect(UnityEngine.LogType,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)

summary.para: Expect a log message of a specfic type. If an error, assertion or exception log is expected, the test will not fail. The test will fail if a log message is expected but does not appear.

member.param: Log type.
Log message to expect.

summary.para: Triggers an assert if any logs have been received that were not expected. Returns without asserting if all logs received so far have been registered as expected.
Wrapper for running tests that are imlpemented as MonoBehaviours.
The test component attached this object.
The GameObject that hold test component.
Allows you to define a cleanup method for the test that is invoked after all tests are run.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.PostBuildCleanupAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)

summary.para: Points to a class that implements TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup. The method from TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup is executed after all tests are run.

member.param: Type of the class implementing TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup.
Name of the class implementing TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.PostBuildCleanupAttribute.#ctor(System.String)

summary.para: Points to a class that implements TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup. The method from TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup is executed after all tests are run.

member.param: Type of the class implementing TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup.
Name of the class implementing TestTools.IPostbuildCleanup.

summary.para: Allows to define a setup method for the test that will be invoked before the test run is started.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.PrebuildSetupAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)

summary.para: Points to a class that implements TestTools.IPrebuildSetup. The method from TestTools.IPrebuildSetup is executed before the test run is initiated.

member.param: Type of the class implementing TestTools.IPrebuildSetup.
Name of the class implementing TestTools.IPrebuildSetup.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.PrebuildSetupAttribute.#ctor(System.String)

summary.para: Points to a class that implements TestTools.IPrebuildSetup. The method from TestTools.IPrebuildSetup is executed before the test run is initiated.

member.param: Type of the class implementing TestTools.IPrebuildSetup.
Name of the class implementing TestTools.IPrebuildSetup.

summary.para: Platforms the tests can run on.
For specifying platforms to run on.
Excluded platforms.
Included platforms.
Special type of a SetUp that allows to yield before the test is running.
Special type of a TearDown that allows to yield after the test is running.
Special type of a unit test that allows to yield from test in order to skip frames when the test is running.
Compares two Color objects for equality within the given tolerance.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.Utils.ColorEqualityComparer.#ctor(System.Single)

summary.para: Creates an instance with a custom error value.

member.param: The absolute error tolerance to be considered while comparing r, g, b, a atributes.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.Utils.ColorEqualityComparer.Equals(UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color)

summary.para: Compares the actual and expected Color objects for equality.

member.param: Expected Color object.
Actual Color object to be compared with expected.

returns.para: Returns true if expected and actual objects are equal, else false.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.TestTools.Utils.ColorEqualityComparer.GetHashCode(UnityEngine.Color)

summary.para: Hash code implementation which returns same hash code for all equal Color objects.

member.param: The Color object for which the hash code is to be computed.

returns.para: The hash code.

summary.para: A comparer instance with default error 0.01f.

summary.para: Hash code implementation which returns same hash code for all equal float values.
